name: Mordovermis
movement: 10 ft. walking speed, 40 ft. flying speed (hover)
description: The mordovermis is a large aberration with a grotesque form, capable of flying and unique in its psychological powers.
memorable: Its ability to charm creatures and consume them while grappling makes it a threatening foe in combat.
goals: To manipulate and incapacitate foes, using psychological control and physical attacks.
relations: Often found alone but can collaborate with other aberrant creatures or mind-affecting beings.
environment: Typically inhabits dark, secluded areas away from sunlight, such as caves or ruins.
strengths: Good physical capabilities, resistance to condition effects, and extraordinary crowd control abilities.
weaknesses: Sunlight sensitivity which hampers its attack rolls and visual perception.
attacks: Employs multiattack with nasty sting attacks, capable of inflicting piercing and acid damage.
most_powerful_ability: Transfixing Gaze, which can incapacitate an opponent by charming them.
senses: Has darkvision that allows it to see in darkness up to 120 feet.
additional_information: Sinuous Form enables it to squeeze through tight spaces.
Aberrant Resilience provides multiple resistances against common status effects.
Consume ability allows dealing significant damage while grappling foes.
Teleportation or fiendish connections could enhance its threat level in certain scenarios.
Low Intelligence makes it poor at solving puzzles or strategic planning.
test_queries: large creature that thrives in darkness
manipulative beast with a consume ability
grotesque aberration with mental control powers
